metadata.Title: CVE-2011-1947 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
fetchmail 5.9.9 through 6.3.19 does not properly limit the wait time afterissuing a (1) STARTTLS or (2) STLS request, which allows remote servers tocause a denial of service (application hang) by acknowledging the requestbut not sending additional packets.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1947` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fetchmail - 6.3.26-1
fetchmailconf - 6.3.26-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fetchmail package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.26-1').
